sn35.248:1.4: Evanhi sa, bhikkhave, yavakalapi suhata assa chahi byabhangihi hannamana.
sn35.248:1.6: So tam yavakalapim sattamaya byabhangiya haneyya.
sn35.248:1.7: Evanhi sa bhikkhave, yavakalapi suhatatara assa, sattamaya byabhangiya hannamana.
sn35.248:1.8: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, assutava puthujjano cakkhusmim hannati manapamanapehi rupehi …pe…
sn35.248:1.11: Sace so, bhikkhave, assutava puthujjano ayatim punabbhavaya ceteti, evanhi so, bhikkhave, moghapuriso suhatataro hoti, seyyathapi sa yavakalapi sattamaya byabhangiya hannamana.
sn35.248:2.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo asure amantesi:
sn35.248:2.3: ‘sace, marisa, devasurasangame samupabyulhe asura jineyyum deva parajineyyum, yena nam sakkam devanamindam kanthapancamehi bandhanehi bandhitva mama santike aneyyatha asurapuran’ti.
sn35.248:2.4: Sakkopi kho, bhikkhave, devanamindo deve tavatimse amantesi:
sn35.248:2.5: ‘sace, marisa, devasurasangame samupabyulhe deva jineyyum asura parajineyyum, yena nam vepacittim asurindam kanthapancamehi bandhanehi bandhitva mama santike aneyyatha sudhammam devasabhan’ti.
sn35.248:2.6: Tasmim kho pana, bhikkhave, sangame deva jinimsu, asura parajinimsu.
sn35.248:2.7: Atha kho, bhikkhave, deva tavatimsa vepacittim asurindam kanthapancamehi bandhanehi bandhitva sakkassa devanamindassa santike anesum sudhammam devasabham.
sn35.248:2.8: Tatra sudam, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo kanthapancamehi bandhanehi baddho hoti.
sn35.248:2.9: Yada kho, bhikkhave, vepacittissa asurindassa evam hoti:
sn35.248:2.10: ‘dhammika kho deva, adhammika asura, idheva danaham devapuram gacchami’ti.
sn35.248:2.11: Atha kanthapancamehi bandhanehi muttam attanam samanupassati, dibbehi ca pancahi kamagunehi samappito samangibhuto paricareti.
sn35.248:2.12: Yada ca kho, bhikkhave, vepacittissa asurindassa evam hoti:
sn35.248:2.13: ‘dhammika kho asura, adhammika deva, tattheva danaham asurapuram gamissami’ti.
sn35.248:2.14: atha kanthapancamehi bandhanehi baddham attanam samanupassati, dibbehi ca pancahi kamagunehi parihayati.
sn35.248:2.17: Mannamano kho, bhikkhave, baddho marassa, amannamano mutto papimato.
sn35.248:3.1: ‘Asmi’ti, bhikkhave, mannitametam, ‘ayamahamasmi’ti mannitametam, ‘bhavissan’ti mannitametam, ‘na bhavissan’ti mannitametam, ‘rupi bhavissan’ti mannitametam, ‘arupi bhavissan’ti mannitametam, ‘sanni bhavissan’ti mannitametam, ‘asanni bhavissan’ti mannitametam, ‘nevasanninasanni bhavissan’ti mannitametam.
sn35.248:3.2: Mannitam, bhikkhave, rogo, mannitam gando, mannitam sallam.
sn35.248:4.1: ‘Asmi’ti, bhikkhave, injitametam, ‘ayamahamasmi’ti injitametam, ‘bhavissan’ti injitametam, ‘na bhavissan’ti injitametam, ‘rupi bhavissan’ti injitametam, ‘arupi bhavissan’ti injitametam, ‘sanni bhavissan’ti injitametam, ‘asanni bhavissan’ti injitametam, ‘nevasanninasanni bhavissan’ti injitametam.
sn35.248:4.2: Injitam, bhikkhave, rogo, injitam gando, injitam sallam.
sn35.248:5.1: ‘Asmi’ti, bhikkhave, phanditametam, ‘ayamahamasmi’ti phanditametam, ‘bhavissan’ti …pe… ‘na bhavissan’ti … ‘rupi bhavissan’ti … ‘arupi bhavissan’ti … ‘sanni bhavissan’ti … ‘asanni bhavissan’ti … ‘nevasanninasanni bhavissan’ti phanditametam.
sn35.248:5.2: Phanditam, bhikkhave, rogo, phanditam gando, phanditam sallam.
sn35.248:6.1: ‘Asmi’ti, bhikkhave, papancitametam, ‘ayamahamasmi’ti papancitametam, ‘bhavissan’ti …pe… ‘na bhavissan’ti … ‘rupi bhavissan’ti … ‘arupi bhavissan’ti … ‘sanni bhavissan’ti … ‘asanni bhavissan’ti … ‘nevasanninasanni bhavissan’ti papancitametam.
sn35.248:6.2: Papancitam, bhikkhave, rogo, papancitam gando, papancitam sallam.
sn35.248:7.1: ‘Asmi’ti, bhikkhave, managatametam, ‘ayamahamasmi’ti managatametam, ‘bhavissan’ti managatametam, ‘na bhavissan’ti managatametam, ‘rupi bhavissan’ti managatametam, ‘arupi bhavissan’ti managatametam, ‘sanni bhavissan’ti managatametam, ‘asanni bhavissan’ti managatametam, ‘nevasanninasanni bhavissan’ti managatametam.
sn35.248:7.2: Managatam, bhikkhave, rogo, managatam gando, managatam sallam.
